messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/8/2003 2:29:52 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
>
> Casey is 9. She's been asking me who else will be at the conference
> that's close to her age. Now I have name to give her. :o) Thanks.

there....

Ren
